title: Unleashing the Power of Agentic Process Automation: Meet ProAgent, Your New Workflow Superhero!
summary: Imagine a world where robots not only take over mundane tasks but also possess human-like intelligence to construct and execute complex workflows. Welcome to the future of Agentic Process Automation (APA) with ProAgent - an LLM-based agent that revolutionizes the way we work!
intro: Get ready to experience the dawn of a new era in automation technology! ProAgent, an innovative solution based on Large Language Models (LLMs), empowers your workflows with agentic intelligence, making it possible to tackle even the most elaborate tasks with ease.
text: In this groundbreaking paper, we introduce Agentic Process Automation (APA), a game-changing automation paradigm that leverages LLM-based agents for advanced workflow construction and decision-making. By offloading human labor to these intelligent agents, we can focus on high-value tasks while they handle the rest. Say goodbye to tedious workflow design and hello to ProAgent, the ultimate workflow superhero!
prompt: Envision a futuristic workplace where humans and AI agents collaborate seamlessly, maximizing productivity and efficiency. Create an image that captures the essence of this vision, showcasing ProAgent as the central figure, surrounded by diverse agents working together towards a common goal.
creator: Yining Ye, Xin Cong, Shizuo Tian, Jiannan Cao, Hao Wang, Yujia Qin, Yaxi Lu, Heyang Yu, Huadong Wang, Yankai Lin, Zhiyuan Liu, Maosong Sun
